price: Sũ, darajõji* ne a wurin Allah, kuma Allah Mai gani ne ga abin da suke aikatawa.
arabic: هُمۡ دَرَجَٰتٌ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرُۢ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: * Mũminai mãsu darajõji ne a wurin Allah gwargwadon ĩmãninsu da taƙawarsu da kuma falalar da Allah Ya yi musu. Haka sũ kuma kãfirai sunã da magangara zuwa ƙasa gwargwadon mugun aikinsu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: hum darajātun ʿinda al-lahi wal-lahu baṣīrun bimā yaʿmalūna
